mapper.update: update stores set stores_password = #{storesPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stores_name = #{storesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stores_address = #{storesAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stores_introduced = #{storesIntroduced,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sions_id = #{sionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where stores_id = #{storesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select stores_id, stores_password, stores_name, stores_address, stores_introduced, sions_id from stores where stores_id = #{storesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select stores_id, stores_password, stores_name, stores_address, stores_introduced, sions_id from stores
